name: webcam
title: Webcam Activity
description: Simple activity to take a picture by using a USB connected camera
author: Alessandro Chimera <achimera@tibco.com>

settings.name: deviceID
settings.description: The device Id of the connected webcam (0 is usually the onboard webcam)

settings.name: imageWidth
settings.description: The image resolution width  setting (must be supported by the webcam)

settings.name: imageHeight
settings.description: The image resolution height setting (must be supported by the webcam)
